case.title: seeking friend/companion - 50 (Brooklyn)
case.text:
I am a white, 50 year old, attractive woman, looking for friendship or more, with someone who is honest, sincere, witty, & intelligent..... please be between 45-55, live in Brooklyn or Staten Island
Do not respond if you're married, in your 30s, & live in a different state, I'll just delete the email.
